value:
The heron clan are truly statuesque.
Witnessing my companion in wedding
attire is nothing short of perfection.

Sandstorms are commonplace in my
country of Hatari, so I haven't had
the chance to dress like this before.

This bridal festival reminds me
that Rafiel and I never exchanged
official vows, despite being married.

It may seem surprising, but I am an
aesthete. Matters concerning beauty
and the arts deeply touch my soul.

Rafiel...If you leave this world before
me, I'll never forgive you.

Will you come with me? A wedding
ceremony is taking place at
$Nf's castle.

No matter how I dress, my combat
prowess will always remain intact.

I will pursue happiness...
No one can stand in my way.

Perhaps I was overconfident...
I had better shape up.

A wedding present, how kind.
Thank you.

I am Nailah, ruler of the desert
kingdom Hatari.$k$pThis bridal festival will provide
some respite so I can celebrate
the future of me and my partner.

By my hand alone, I have fought
legions of warriors and reaped many
spoils all in the name of my country.$k$pThere's no doubt that my greatest
achievement is ruling over Hatari.
However...$k$pI never expected to encounter such a
precious person on my travels as my
dear, irreplaceable Rafiel.$k$pMy future lies with him because he
cradles my heart. No matter the trials
we face, together we will prevail.$k$pMy bond with Rafiel shall remain
everlasting. Stand witness to our
vows, $Nu.
せやっ
I'll bring you down.
ぐっ…
Not bad...!
To have and to hold.
For my husband.
I pledge my love!
Remember your vows.
Rafiel... My love...
Giggle
Wedding attire for a festival? How eccentric.
Don't be rude, now. I wouldn't want to use my fangs.
Rafiel is the ideal partner. He calms my nerves and keeps my heart at ease.
Well, what do you think? ...Hehe, Don't worry, I won't bite you. It's such a nice day.
Wearing an outfit as elegant as this truly warms my heart.
We mustn't idle. Bring my groom, with haste.
It's so nice to be all dressed up for once. I'm glad you can see me like this.
Is that right?
Don't waver.
Let's walk together.
